function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Accelerated spread of virus due to population fleeing or traveling under the radar","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access to food due to movement restrictions and closure of markets and food vendors","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Systemic vulnerabilities in informal settlements including health, social, natural, and infrastructural issues","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited livelihoods and savings may lead to economic vulnerability and inability to access vital resources like water.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Haphazard health seeking behavior in severe disease cases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Perception of inadequate or inappropriate care at hospitals","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fear of seeking care due to messaging about no cure for covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"People working through illness due to need to make a living","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited ventilation increasing transmission risk","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate access to water and handwashing facilities","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Prevalence of undetected and poorly managed chronic conditions in communities, increasing the risk of large numbers of people being at risk.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of evidence on social and environmental transmission dynamics, leading to uncertainty in understanding and mitigating transmission vulnerability.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High population and housing density in informal settlements leading to increased opportunities for social mixing and limited options for physical distancing.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High prevalence of chronic conditions in informal settlements","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poorly documented disease burdens and reliance on informal healthcare providers","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Environmental factors increasing the risk of respiratory diseases","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of data on informal settlements and the novelty of the disease","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Epidemiological vulnerability to covid-19, especially for those over 70 years of age and with underlying health conditions","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential gender differences in infection rates, with men being almost twice as likely to die as women","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Informal settlements with inadequate infrastructure and services","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of secure tenure for residents","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mistrust in government messaging and control measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Restrictive control measures may not be sustainable","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Swift action needed before widespread transmission in lmic cities takes hold","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Organizational challenges of epidemic control require meaningful local involvement","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited infrastructure in informal urban settlements","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of data about informal settlements prior to and during emergencies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inappropriate responses to disease outbreaks in informal settlements","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Informal urban settlements with limited access to healthcare may experience a rapid spread of contagious diseases due to overcrowding and inadequate sanitation.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of official recognition and support for informal settlements may result in limited access to healthcare resources and public health interventions.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access to essential services such as water and space","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited availability of accurate and timely information about covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unequal distribution of resources and access to healthcare based on income levels","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Integration of digital technology may compromise privacy and data security.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Relying solely on digital technology for pandemic policy and response may lead to a false sense of security.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unequal access to digital technology may exacerbate disparities in pandemic response and containment.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Socioeconomic inequalities and healthcare disparities amplified by digital health initiatives.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Privacy infringement and increased risk among individuals with mental illness or restricted access to necessities.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Rapid diagnosis and risk prediction of covid-19 through ai and machine learning algorithms","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of cloud-based ai-assisted ct service for detecting covid-19 pneumonia","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global availability of open-source deep convolutional neural network design for detecting covid-19 cases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of compliance with quarantine and isolation measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inaccurate reporting of symptoms in self-reported surveys","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of digital technology for quarantine and self-isolation monitoring","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of ai-powered surveillance for monitoring and restricting public gatherings","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Enforcement of quarantine with tracking devices and fines","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential privacy concerns with the collection and storage of personal health data through mobile applications.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of missed exposure and contact tracing due to the absence of mobile phones or mobile service.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Low adoption rates of contact tracing applications leading to reduced effectiveness of the mitigation strategy.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of widespread testing and screening technologies","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"}]}
